title: Associates in Mathematics
body: I received an associate degree in mathematics from LA Pierce College with gpa of 3.81. After this I transferred to a 4 year institute

title: Bachelors in Computer Science
body: At the University of California, Riverside I improved as a programmer by taking rigorous courses such as Machine Learning and Data Mining, Data Analysis Methods, and Data Structures and Algorithms

title: Intern at Sizzle
body: During my time as an intern for Sizzle, I had the opportunity to build full stack applications for both web and mobile.
